sections.text: The salty breeze carries the cries of distant gulls as your ship sails across the shimmering Jade Sea. Rumors speak of hidden treasure on the Isle of Serpents.

options.description: Take the helm and steer toward the Isle of Serpents
Interrogate the captured pirate in the brig

sections.text: The captured pirate snarls but whispers about a secret cove guarded by a sea monster.

consequence.text: The pirate lunges at you with a hidden dagger before the guards subdue him.

options.description: Leave him and return to the deck

sections.text: You steer toward the mysterious Isle of Serpents. As you approach, dark storm clouds gather overhead.

options.description: Drop anchor and wait for the storm to pass

consequence.text: A rogue wave crashes onto the deck, injuring several crew members.

sections.text: Shaken, the pirate reveals that the sea monster can be lulled to sleep by an enchanted conch shell hidden deep within a wrecked galleon.

options.description: Ignore the legend and continue to the island

sections.text: The storm rages violently. Lightning flashes illuminate shadowy shapes beneath the waves.

options.description: Dive into the water to investigate

consequence.text: A swirling current drags you under before the crew hauls you back aboard.

options.description: Stay on deck and brace for impact

sections.text: After hours of waiting, the storm clears and the Isle of Serpents looms ahead, shrouded in mist.
You find the wrecked galleon resting on a coral reef. The conch shell glows faintly within a locked chest.

consequence.text: Splinters cut your hands as you force the chest open.

sections.text: Beneath the waves, you glimpse the massive serpent coiled around a treasure-laden wreck.
The storm subsides. Your ship drifts into calm waters, and the sun breaks through the clouds.

options.description: Set a course for the Isle of Serpents

sections.text: You step onto the white sands of the Isle of Serpents. Ancient ruins rise above the jungle canopy.

options.description: Climb the tallest ruin for a better view

sections.text: Inside the chest, you find the enchanted conch shell. Its surface hums softly with power.

options.description: Blow the conch to summon help

sections.text: The chest bursts open, revealing the glowing conch shell.
Inside the ruins, you discover a chamber filled with gold and jewels, but a trap triggers!

consequence.text: A rock grazes your shoulder as you narrowly escape.

sections.text: From the top of the ruins, you spot a hidden lagoon surrounded by jagged cliffs.
You reach a secret pirate hideout filled with treasure. The crew celebrates your discovery.
Breathing heavily, you escape the collapsing ruins with your life intact.
An unreachable whirlpool drags you into darkness. You shouldnâ€™t be here.
